# R-Ladies Global

## What's R-Ladies Global

<span class="fragment"> ![](images/rladies_global.png){.centered-image width="100%"}

<span class="fragment"> - Organization dedicated to promoting gender diversity in the R programming community

<span class="fragment"> - Founded in 2012, by ***Gabriela de Queiroz***

<span class="fragment"> - It aims to create a supportive network for gender minorities who use **R**

<span class="fragment"> - Missions achieved by organizing meetups, workshops, and events

<span class="fragment"> -  Share code (**R-Ladies Global Github**)

<span class="fragment"> - And if you are an R-Lady and want to start a chapter near you, you can get in touch via **chapters@rladies.org**
